<<<<<<< HEAD
An apologie for vvomenkinde I. G., fl. 1605.
[32] p.
Printed by Ed. Allde for William Ferebrand, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes-head Alley neere the Royall Exchange, London : 1605.
Dedication signed: I.G. In verse. Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴. Vertical chain lines. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Printed by Ed. Allde for William Ferebrand, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes-head Alley neere the Royall Exchange, London : 1605.
Dedication signed: I.G. In verse. Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴. Vertical chain lines. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
William Ferebrand
Ed. Allde
his shop in Popes-head Alley neere the Royall Exchange
